pr_title: Assorted mappings, mainly enchanting, some rendering params and generator type.

timeline.message:
Assorted mappings, mainly enchanting, some rendering params and generator type.

(cherry picked from commit b573c98c68e1b28b81fa4280aea085f330e4ed0f)

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -53,14 +58,25 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1890 net/minecraft/enchantment/EnchantmentHelper
 		ARG 0 entity
 	METHOD method_8206 getLoyalty (Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)I
 		ARG 0 stack
-	METHOD method_8209 forEachEnchantment (Lnet/minecraft/class_1890$class_1891;Ljava/lang/Iterable;)V
-		ARG 0 action
+	METHOD method_8207 (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;Lnet/minecraft/class_1297;Lnet/minecraft/class_1887;I)V
+		ARG 2 enchantment
+		ARG 3 level
+	METHOD method_8208 (Lorg/apache/commons/lang3/mutable/MutableFloat;Lnet/minecraft/class_1310;Lnet/minecraft/class_1887;I)V
+		ARG 2 enchantment
+		ARG 3 level
+	METHOD method_8209 acceptEnchantments (Lnet/minecraft/class_1890$class_1891;Ljava/lang/Iterable;)V

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -156,7 +175,10 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1890 net/minecraft/enchantment/EnchantmentHelper
 			COMMENT whether treasure enchantments may appear
 	METHOD method_8234 getEfficiency (Lnet/minecraft/class_1309;)I
 		ARG 0 entity
-	CLASS class_1891 Consumer
+	CLASS class_1891 Visitor

timeline.bodyText: Really need a better name for this.
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
That makes me think of a method which gets a registry entry which is marked as required.
This is basically get(RegistryKey<T>) but non-null and throws if the value is not present
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: Apparently cannot think of a better name than require unfortunately. I honestly would rename the optional one to find but that's out of scope. This is good.
replies.author: liach
YanisBft

replies.bodyText: getRequired makes me think it has to be a builtin biome to use the method. getOrThrow could work but is not as succinct as require
replies.author: i509VCB
